(I don't have a bore scope so I have looked down the barrel using a flashing to illuminate it which is the best I can do with what I have on hand)  The forearm wood shows a good amount of usage wear, but is still intact with one 3 inch crack.  The stock itself is in decent shape, with one small hairline crack about 1 inch long.  The butt plate also has a crack.
